subject: Technology
title: The Hubble Space Telescope
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Hubble Space Telescope.

hook.text: In 1990, NASA launched a telescope into orbit and immediately discovered it was broken.

buildup.text: Hubble's main mirror had a flaw. Images came back blurry. It was the most expensive mistake NASA had made.

discovery.text: Astronauts flew up and installed corrective optics, like giving the telescope glasses.

twist.text: Once fixed, Hubble revealed the universe in stunning detail. It showed galaxies 13 billion years old.

climax.text: Hubble proved the universe is expanding faster than expected. That discovery won the Nobel Prize.

punchline.text: A broken telescope became one of science's greatest tools.

quiz.question: What was wrong with the Hubble telescope at launch?
options: Its main mirror was flawed, producing blurry images
It was pointed the wrong direction
